title: 95: Episode #95: Hell Froze Over
itunes:title: Episode #95: Hell Froze Over
description:
• Eric hosts…the fearsome threesome.
  • The Big Easy, The Big Apple, and the City of Angels.
  • We discuss Jo’s U.S. book tour.
  • The WOMBATs are back and Micah thinks he’s done awful.
  • Jo’s interviews around the release of Deathly Hallows.
  • Pickle Pack registration closed.
  • Laura has a big PO Box update.
  • Listener Rebuttals: Opals and the Chronology of Book Covers.
  • Voicemails return: those things still exist?
  • Does the deluxe edition cover have to be over New Zealand?
  • Can Harry transfer his protection from Privet Drive to Hogwarts?
  • Why does Trelawney call Voldemort “the Dark Lord”?
  • What are the powers of Hufflepuff’s Cup?
  • Micah thinks he knows how Book 7 will end.
  • Road to Deathly Hallows continued: Who will live and who will die?
  • Chicken Soup for the MuggleCast Soul.
itunes:author: Harry Potter
dc:creator: Harry Potter
